questions.questionText: A man was standing facing South, after a while he is seen facing the North-East direction. Which of the following statement is true in regards to his position?

options.text: He turned 45° in the clock-wise direction
He turned 135° in the anticlock-wise direction
He turned 135° in the clock-wise direction
He turned 270° in the anticlock-wise direction

hints: This is from the 2016 IPM exam (Q14).
Think carefully about what the question is asking.
Try working backwards from the options.

stepByStep.text: Correct answer: Option 2 — He turned 135° in the anticlock-wise direction

questions.questionText: A square and an equilateral triangle have equal perimeter. Then which of the following statement is true?

Side of square > side of triangle
